attributes.action: "Jacinda's Law" - a crime to publish name of anyone charged with an atrocity.
attributes.additional_details:
Murderers, drug lords and psychopathic serial killers are elevated to cult hero status in films, documentaries and in folk-law - cut off their oxygen.  

Kill off its' names!

At the same time honour the New Zealand Prime Minister for her principled stand, appropriate leadership and courage.
attributes.background:
Refer to a person charged with an atrocity as the "Accused Cowardly Person" or (if convicted) the "Convicted Cowardly Person" and "it".

Deny it publicity, infamy and publicity - other than demonstrating the horror and shame of their actions.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for how people are described in the media. 

You could start a new petition about something the UK Parliament and Government are responsible for. For example, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government and Parliament to ban the reporting of the names of terrorists or mass murders, if that's what you'd like to happen.
